cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking west-northwest across the eastern Caribbean Sea, forecast to skirt southern Hispaniola Saturday, pass near Jamaica Sunday, then approach Cuba and the Florida Peninsula early next week.

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch: southern Haiti; Tropical Storm Watch: Grenada, Saba, Sint Eustatius, Jamaica, Dominica
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: Barbados, St. Lucia, St. Vincent and the Grenadines; Tropical Storm Warning: Martinique, southern Dominican Republic coast, entire coast of Haiti
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Windward and southern Leeward Islands, eastern Caribbean, southern Hispaniola, Jamaica, eastern Cuba, Florida Peninsula (future)
weather_observation.expected_leaving_port_date: N/A (not expected to closely approach within 5-day cone)
weather_observation.first_hazard: None expected at port within 5 days
